title: How Bearman went from last to the points in Bahrain GP
summary: Oliver Bearman contributed to a great day for Haas in the Bahrain GP by finishing 10th from last on the grid. Here's how he did it

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Oliver Bearman drive for during the Bahrain GP?
What position did Oliver Bearman finish in at the Bahrain GP?
From what position on the grid did Oliver Bearman start the Bahrain GP?
